__e: Come on, they would never court-martial me for trying to save civilian lives.
- You'll all be court-martialed for this.
General Brown will probably court-marshal me for this if I'm still alive.

I know this leg means I won't last very long... but I pray I can manage to have enough time to amass evidence... and bring to a court-martial... all those who discredit and dishonor... the uniform of the Union.
He's gonna be court-martialled... and I'm gonna make sure he gets what's coming to him.
You're gonna be court-martialled and I can't help ya.
